Name: Sunsteel Strike
Effect: Lethal. If anything on the foe's side of the field would prevent this move from dealing damage (Pokemon types. Abilities. Shield Moves. Weather. Or Barriers.) ignore it. This Move cannot be Clashed.
Description: You suddenly stop your in tracks as you see a bright and blinding light coming towards you at great speed. You did not see what hit you and then it's all darkness.
